```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(xlsx)

```


```{r}

# Reading the data

ratio_data <- read.xlsx("ratio_data.xlsx", 1, header = TRUE)  # read first sheet

```

```{r}

# Plotting the data

mean_ratio = mean(ratio_data$ratio)

ratio_data %>%
  filter(!is.na(approx)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = as.factor(length), y = as.numeric(ratio))) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_hline(yintercept = mean_ratio, col = "red", linetype='dotted') +
  annotate("text", x = 2.4, y = 1.07, label = "Mean ratio = 1.106", vjust = -0.5, col = "red") +
  labs(title = "Approximation score / exact score ratio", x = "Sequence Length", y = "Ratio") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold", size = 14))


```
